Author: iamsplendid
Text: So relatable. Every time I start a new fast it's like "if I can just do this 46 days straight I'll be at my ultimate goal weight!!" Stupid brain.  Also, narrator: "and after she binged again a day later, she reset the consecutive days fasting needed to reach UGW at 56 days."

Author: externalmusings
Text: I totally do this. It doesn't help that skipping a meal/saying you're not hungry is generally more accepted than overeating/binging--especially if you're not underweight.   I always start restricting and think "well maybe this time is different! Maybe I'm so disgusted with myself that I'll never binge again!" but that's never how works.
